description: A group for anyone interested in open data related to Civil Society (voluntary, civic and social organisations). Things to do: 1. Join the Civil Society Open Data Interest Group 2. Subscribe to the Civil Society Open Data Email List 3. Add datasets to the Civil Society Open Datastore (here) What is Civil Society? "Civil Society is composed of the totality of voluntary civic and social organizations and institutions that form the basis of a functioning society, as distinct from the force-backed structures of a state (regardless of that state's political system) and commercial institutions of the market." Wikipedia
title: Civil Society
name: civil-society
